MaxAsyncTracesPerTick: Maximum number of asynchronous traces that can be requested in a single update call
PendingQueriesBudgetReductionRatio:
Defines the amount of async trace queries to prevent based on the number of pending queries at the start of an update.
1 means that the async trace budget is slashed by the pending queries count
0 means that the async trace budget is not impacted by the pending queries
bUseAsynchronousTraceForDefaultSightQuer: Defines if we are allowed to use asynchronous trace queries when there is no IAISightTargetInterface for a Target
